canBeSettledWithAcceptedProposal
canBeSettledByArbiter

acceptProposal(bytes32).details: Accept proposal by respondent.     Dispute must exist and proposal must be active.

getFixedAndShareFees().return: Preconfigured arbitration fees for the current contract.

getTimeLimitForReplyOnProposal().return: Preconfigured time limit for respondent to accept/reject proposal.

getWithdrawalAddress().return: Withdrawal address of the current arbitration contract.

isOwner().return: true if `msg.sender` is the owner of the contract.

rejectProposal(bytes32).details: Reject proposal by respondent.     Dispute must exist and proposal must be active.

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.

setTimeLimitForReplyOnProposal(uint256).details: Update time limit for respondent to accept or reject proposal.

settleDispute(bytes32,uint256,uint256).details: Settle dispute without active proposal or with the best deal for respondent.     Settlement can be initiated from the contract methods or from the contract owner address.     A dispute should be started but not ended yet.

params._initiatorShare: An `uint8` share for a dispute initiator.
params._respondentShare: An `uint8` share for a dispute respondent.

startDispute(bytes32,address,int256).details: Start dispute for the given project.

params._idHash: A `bytes32` hash of a project id.
params._respondent: An `address` of the second paty involved in the dispute.
params._respondentShareProposal: An `int` value indicating percentage of disputed funds proposed to the respondent. Valid values range is 0-100, different values are considered as 'No Proposal'. When provided percentage is 100 then this dispute is processed automatically, and all funds are distributed in favor of the respondent.

transferAnyERC20Token(address,uint256).details: Allows to trasnfer any ERC20 tokens from the contract balance to owner's address.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

devdoc.title: Contract for Arbitration role and hanlding its events and actions.

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.
